Players may burn the pie while baking one, resulting in a burnt pie; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. SMW Subobject for HalfHigh Alchemy value: 9Examine: Mmm half a botanical pie.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Botanical pieUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Half a botanical pie.pngWeight: 0.225Value: 15Version anchor: HalfRelease date: 26 May 2016Item ID: 19659

Botanical pies are a type of pie that can be obtained by baking an uncooked botanical pie on a cooking range, requiring level 52 Cooking and granting 180 experience when successful. Players may burn the pie while baking one, resulting in a burnt pie; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 84 on ranges. Alternatively, casting the Bake Pie spell from the lunar spellbook guarantees successful baking of all pies.

Botanical pie heals 14 Hitpoints in total, 2 bites each healing 7, and grant a temporary skill boost to Herblore by 4 levels, the second highest available. However, this is a reliable boost, unlike brown spicy stew, which provides a random boost between a -5 and 5 when 3 brown spices are added. After eating it, a pie dish will remain.

  • 2 Changes

  • 3 Trivia

Materials
ItemQuantityCost
Uncooked botanical pie11,755
Total Cost1,755
Botanical pie11,575
Profit−180
  1. ↑ The ticks increase to 4 when using the Make-X functionality.
Steps
1. Use a pastry dough on a pie dish to make a pie shell
2. Use a golovanova fruit top on the pie shell to make an uncooked botanical pie
3. Cook the uncooked botanical pie on a range to finish a botanical pie

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 September 2017
(update)

The item was graphically updated.

2 June 2016
(update)
  • Botanical pie is no longer a F2P item.
  • Cooking botanical pie on the Lumbridge range now correctly states botanical pie & correctly cooks 5 or x when selected.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Players used to be able to train Herblore without completing the Druidic Ritual quest by eating a botanical pie and creating attack potions. This has since been patched.
